name: Collectiboom!
description:
Collectiboom is a small game inspired by the classic game Minesweeper, but with the added excitement of discovering treasures along the way!

Avoid mines and try to find an assortment of collectable items. Be careful though, you must complete the level to save the items you've found!

- Quick sessions of addictive gameplay

- Charming pixel graphics

- 42 collectables to find across many different categories ranging from breakfast foods to the elements
